title: Chapter 1380 - Making Trouble!
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1380 - Making Trouble!

When the Wood Spirit Monarch and the other old monsters stepped aside, each left behind a bag of holding. They said these gifts were an expression of gratitude, and they asked Su Yi not to refuse.

In truth, before Su Yi could even say anything, Sword Immortal Qingshi smiled and threw their “expressions of gratitude” to the Bookkeeper.

The Bookkeeper snuck a peak at the first bag’s contents. Although his expression never wavered, he couldn’t help but gasp inwardly.

Even if he just looked at the Transcendent-level medicinal ingredients, there were more than ten types!

There were also spirit crystals, divine materials, and other goods. All were top treasures of the Path of Transcendence.

And this was just the first of the storage treasures!

There are still about ten ancient factions left, including over a thousand Transcendents. By the time this is over, who knows how many treasures the Temple Master will have acquired?

The Bookkeeper’s thoughts raced in all directions. He was highly proficient at settling accounts and tallying sums. After all, he was the hidden boss of Four Seas Tower, the man they called the God of Wealth. He was naturally well aware of how precious Transcendent treasures...
